name: Mad Eye's Mad Eye
description: I came up with this pattern in August of 2009 and just had to share it!
full_text: I came up with this pattern in August of 2009 and just had to share it! It is a perfect quick-knit for fun stash-busting, Harry Potter themed swaps, costume parties, and general magical mayhem! If you happen to find any problems with the pattern, please send me a message on Ravelry! Mad Eye's Mad Eye by Linnea Tracy is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 United States License .
